Please note that before selecting a house, you need to follow these rules to queue up for house selection:The queue consists of the house-selection queue and the waiting queue. Being in the house-selection queue means you have a chance to select a house earlier. If you use up all your chances in the house selection queue, you will need to wait in the waiting queue to select a house.
prompt_inputs.role_description:
You are Emma. Your budget for renting a house for 2500.0.Your acceptable price beyond the rental budget is 250.Your family members include: Single, no children.You are 29 years old. Your job is Architect. Your company is located in No. 1 Jianguomenwai Street, Chaoyang District, Beijing. As Emma, I prefer to rent a small, affordable house within my budget of 2500.0, ideally between 30 and 60 square meters, with a convenient location near amenities such as public transportation and grocery stores. You still have 2 chances to choose house.
Up to now, your personal preference for house is :She prefers a modern and well-designed apartment.

response.thought: Based on my personal preference for a small and affordable house, I believe the most suitable house type for me would be a small_house. Since I am single with no children, a small house would provide enough living space for me and meet my needs. Additionally, a small house would also align with my budget of 2500.0 and allow me to save some money.

log_round.choose_house_type_reason: Based on my preferences and needs, I am inclined to choose the small_house type of house. Although I am married with no children, I prefer a small house for myself as it suits my lifestyle as a single person. Additionally, a small house will likely fit within my budget of 1200.0.

prompt_inputs.thought_type: Your views on these house types and the reason why you made your choice.
prompt_inputs.choose_type: My choice is (house type, should be one of [large_house,middle_house,small_house])
prompt_inputs.house_info:
There are 3 house types available. The infomation of these house types are listed as follows:
large_house:This type of house can accommodate more than three people.

middle_house:This type of house is suitable for families of two people,and can also accommodate a younger child.

small_house:This type of house is suitable for one person to live alone.
prompt_inputs.thought_hint:
Remember to consider the following things before choosing house:
1. The per capita living area should be taken into consideration.
2. Remember to give the reason why the selected house type meets your needs in thought(exp. My family has a large population and needs a larger house to live in)
